instruction: Give an example of a famous person who made a major contribution to Deep Learning.
output: Geoffrey Hinton is a famous person who made a major contribution to Deep Learning. He was an early pioneer in the field and is credited with introducing the concept of backpropagation and the development of neural networks for machine learning. He has also led many groundbreaking projects, such as the ImageNet competition, which served as the driving force behind current advances in computer vision.
